casebody.data:
Louis BONAMICO, alias Louis Toriana, Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Appellee. No. 6057. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. March 31, 1931. Rehearing Denied April 24, 1931. Richard A. Dowling, of New Orleans, La., for appellant. E. E. Talbot, U. S. Atty., and P. M. Flanagan, Asst. U. S. Atty., both of New Orleans, La.

Before FOSTER, SIBLEY, .and HUTCHESON, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment in this case is affirmed.
